name: Coherent Solutions
tag_list: software-development-outsourcing, offshore-software-development, software-development, software, offshore, outsourcing
overview:
Coherent Solutions, Inc. is a U.S.-based software development outsourcing firm that specializes in providing services to small and medium-sized software companies.

Coherent Solutions delivers its services through a combination of U.S.-based resources and offshore resources located in its Development Center in Minsk. Its outsourcing model delivers better value and relies on two key components: (1) value added U.S. delivery management and (2) integration and transparency across the service delivery supply chain. Coherent Solutionsâ€™ model promotes flexibility in serving its clients. This approach allows customers to choose the distribution of resources that best fits the needs of their business and technology environment. Delivery capabilities in the U.S. include project management, business analysis, architecture, and design. Delivery capabilities offshore focus on architecture, design, development, and testing activities.
